department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程一方面著重憲法研究方法與思維模式之訓練，另一方面則透過法學、政治學等學科的不同角度，結合理論與實務，探討目前重要的憲政議題，並分析憲政發展背景、歷程與影響。
goal.en: On the one hand, this course focuses on the training of constitutional research methods and thinking modes. On the other hand, through different perspectives of law, political science and other disciplines, combining theory and practice, it discusses current important constitutional issues, and analyzes the background, history and influence of constitutional development. .

outline.ch:
1.憲法基礎理論
2.憲政改革與修憲
3.基本人權、法律保留
4.比例原則、平等原則
5.審查基準
6.權力分立與中央政府體制
7.半總統制
8.總統與行政院
9.立法院與國會改革
10.司法院與司法改革
11.違憲審查
12.考試院與監察院
13.中央與地方關係
14.基本國策
15.學期報告
outline.en:
1. Basic Theory of the Constitution
2. Constitutional reform and constitutional revision
3. Basic human rights, legal reservations
4. The principle of proportionality and equality
5. Review Benchmarks
6. Separation of powers and central government
7. Semi-Presidential
8. The President and the Executive Yuan
9. The Legislative Yuan and reform of Congress
10. Judicial Yuan and Judicial Reform
11. Review of unconstitutionality
12. Examination Yuan and Supervisory Yuan
13. Central and local government relations
14. Basic national policy
15. Semester report

gradMethod.ch: 出席、報告與參與討論佔10%，期末書面報告（字數約為10000）佔90%。
gradMethod.en: Attendance, reporting and participation in discussions account for 10%, and final written reports (about 10,000 words) account for 90%.

flexDiscription.ch: 同學小組進行討論學期報告反饋與學習成果
flexDiscription.en: Classmate groups discuss term report feedback and learning outcomes
